summary: This mod add Esteban - Breton Companion
descriptionHtml:
============
[color=grey]DESCRIPTION[/color]
============
This mod add Esteban
Essential , 1H weapon , 2H weapon , Archery , Heavy Armor
Marryable , Calculated
You can find his in DeadMansDrink 
I hope you like it

=============
[color=grey]RECOMMENDED[/color]
=============
Geonox Faces

=============
[color=grey]REQUIRED[/color]
=============
Apachii Sky Hair 1.4


=============
[color=grey]INSTALLATION[/color] 
=============
Setup all files to your data folder
=============
[color=grey]UNINSTALLATION[/color]
=============
Delete bsa and esp files
_______________________

[color=grey]CREDITS:[/color]
Apachii for Apachii Sky Hair used in this mod
author: Den987
